channel.title: FLF - Word MP3 Voices
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: The Basileian Lectures [Word MP3 Voices]
item.description: WordMp3 Voices - as series to to feature voices from the past that effect the present. This episode selects voices from "The Basileian Lectures." These lectures were held from 1988-1997 in Wilmington, DE. The organization brought notable speakers to address themes relating to theonomy, reconstructionism, postmillennialism, etc. from the Reformed and Reconstructionist viewpoint. The speakers included R.J. Rushdoony, Greg Bahnsen, Gary North, David Chilton, Ken Gentry, Gary DeMar, Steve Wilkins, Otto Scott, Douglas Wilson, Richard Ganz, James B. Jordan, Herb Titus, George Grant, Ray Sutton and more.
item.author: Gregg Strawbridge
item.itunes:author: Gregg Strawbridge

item.title: David H. Chilton [Word MP3 Voices]
item.description: David Chilton (d. 1997) wrote major works addressing Reformed Reconstructionist views, including a monumental commentary on Revelation (Days of Vengance), and works on economics (Productive Christians in an Age of Guilt Manipulators), responding to "Christian" socialism.  WordMp3 Voices, hosted by Gregg Strawbridge, brings you voices from the past that effect the present.  WordMp3.com is an online audio library of Christian world and life view resources.
item.author: Gregg Strawbridge, David Chilton
item.itunes:author: Gregg Strawbridge, David Chilton

item.title: Cornelius Van Til [Word MP3 Voices]
item.description: WordMp3 Voices, hosted by Gregg Strawbridge, brings you voices from the past that effect the present.  WordMp3.com is an online audio library of Christian world and life view resources.  Our voice today is that of Cornelius Van Til (1895-1987), influential thinker, theologian, pastor, and founding faculty member of Westminster Seminary.
item.author: Dr. Gregg Strawbridge
item.itunes:author: Dr. Gregg Strawbridge
